Summary: was heading west and saw a slightly flatttened dull metallic sphere above the sun hovering and moved a little east
divs: Sighting Detailsmy wife and i were heading west in williamstown, ma, usa, on rt.43 just short of the intersection to rt. 7 south on 11-16-2012 around 2.50 pm. my wife commented on a small rainbow in the sky just north of the sun and how pretty it was becuase the skies were mostly clear. she started taking photos with her iphone 4s. shortly after, i (the driver) spotted well above and slightly south of the sun a slighltly flattened spherical dull metal object (slightly reflective) hovering and moving slowly north for about five seconds. it appeared about baseball size. i had no idea what i had just seen. i announced this to my wife and she said to pull over to take more photos. as i stopped the car and quickly got out i lost sight of the object. my wife took another pic of the sun and rainbow. as we took the left on rt. 7 south (about 100 yards from where we stopped) she started looking at the photos and noticed that a blueish sphere is in the pictures, something she did not see when taking the photos while we were in motion. the object is near the horizon in the first photos and then high in the sky in the later photos. i witnessed it (if it is the same thing) in the high position after her photos, which would be consistent. i have no idea what this was and whether it is just a coincidence that maybe some anomaly occured with her photos. but i know what my eyes saw. it stunned me at first, enough to pull over to try to get a better look, but it had vanished in this short period. it is about 9.15pm now and we have been thinking and talking about this ever since. i see on the web that other people have had similar experiences. i would love for an expert to talk to me and explain what the heck we experienced today. also, i have included a very short video my wife took about twenty minutes after this in the same part of the sky (from the town of lanesboro south of williamstown). an object turned up in this video too. lastly, when i was waiting for my wife at the hospital in the car and examining the photos and video, around 4.15pm, i pulled the keys from the ignition and a few seconds later the radio came back on by itself. something strange electrically happened with the car. that was a first for this car. i assume that was not related whatsoever but worth mentioning because i was already in a peculiar mindset from what we witnessed. i really want to know if the photos do not mean anything- that it was just an optical effect of the camera and therefore a coincidence with my real sighting of this object. there is no doubt whatsoever i saw this with my eyes. i do not know about the camera. would a professional please consult us on this truly bizarre experience. i would love answers. thanks.
